channel.title: Cheat list
channel.description:
one day i was looking for some cheats here for a game i liked.
then i noticed why dont we just make a list of all the cheats and hacks in one place so every one dosnt have to look every were for them
these are not going to be cheats or hackes youve heard of, but cheats that you have acually cheated with
if you want to make a post make it like this:
games name cheat or hack how you found it
i hope this will be alot of help for some of you :)

item.title: Cheat list

item.description:

just use google, theres an abundance of websites already dedicated to this

Too many to post in one place. SRL member section has about one hundred private ones.

please only put game cheats please? please?
